name: Keystone (download.jpg)
description:
Survive as long as possible!

Controls-

  • WASD to move.
  • Left/Right click for melee and ranged spells.
  • QERF to repair/move your movement towers.
  • Shift/Enter to repair/move your spell towers.

Credits-

  • Art - Josh Webb
  • Programming - Brody Foster
  • Design - Julian Falconi
  • Sound - Anyon Fak-McDaniels
  • Moral Support - Mia Scaringe
